https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AmgYHNiL6PE2FG0R6vHGaxzdVty.jpg A wealthy couple (James Brolin and Deidre Hall) are killed on their yacht off the coast of a secluded South American island called Palmyra. The suspects are a hippyish pair (Hart Bochner and Rachel Ward) whom the rich folks had befriended. Itâ€™s fairly clear that the hippies were involved in the crime: The question is, did the man do it while the girl looked on helplessly, or was she a willing accomplice? And the Sea Will Tell
